title: Loan Payoff
description: Calculate the true cost of your loan.

title: Home Affordability
description: Estimate the amount of financing to expect on a house.

title: Mortage Refinancing
description: Estimate the change in your loan if you refinanced.

title: Mortage Acceleration
description: Estimate how soon you could pay off your mortgage.

title: Credit Card Debt
description: Estimate how long it will take to pay off your balance.

title: Lease Payment
description: Estimate how much your monthly lease payment would be.

title: Car Affordability
description: Estimate how much you can afford to pay for a car.
inputTitles: Number of Months of the Loan

title: College Funding
description: Estimate the cost of your child's college education.
inputTitles: Number of Years Until Child Enters College
Number of Years Child Will Attend College
outputTitles: Amount Needed to Save Each Year to Cover the Costs

title: Saving Goals
description: Estimate how much you need to save in order to meet your savings goals.
inputTitles: Number of Years You Have to Save Up
outputTitles: Total Amount Needed to Save Each Year ($)

title: Savings Accumulation
description: Estimate how much money you are on track to save.
inputTitles: Number of Years You Have to Save Up

title: Taxable Equivalent Yield
description: Calculate the rate of return you would have to receive from a taxable investment to realize an equivalent tax-exempt yield.

title: Cost of Retirement
description: How much you will be able to spend in your retirement.

title: Required Minimum Distributions
description: How much money are you required withdraw over the age of 73

title: Impact of Inflaction
description: Estimate the future cost of an item based on todays prices and the expected rate of inflation.

title: Retirement Plan Early Distribution
description: Estimate how much would remain after paying income taxes and penalties if you took an early distribution from a retirement plan.

title: Retirement Portfolio Lifespan
description: Estimate how long your funds will last.

title: Federal Income Tax
description: Deduction Amounts: Single 15,000; Head of Household 22,500; Married Filing Seperately 15,000; Married Filing Jointly 30,000

title: Tax-Deferred Savings
description: Compare tax-deferedd investments to taxable investments.
inputTitles: Expected Pre-tax Annual Rate of Return (%)

title: Roth IRA Conversion
description: Estimate values after converting to Roth IRA
inputTitles: Pre-tax Rate of Return on IRA
Expected Pre-Tax Rate of Return on Withdrawals

title: Estate Taxes
description: Estimate federal estate taxes that could be due on your estate after you die.
